definition: affair/business/matter/to be engaged in/to attend to/by all means
office/situation/classifier for games: match, set, round etc

sentences.english: The Tax Office wanted to levy on my house FOR unpaid taxes.
sentences.chinese: 因我未付稅，稅務局想扣押我的房子。

sentences.english: Party A shall provide to Party B the official invoice printed under the authorization of the relevant tax bureau in the PRC .
sentences.chinese: 甲方必須開具印有稅務局監製章的正式發票。

sentences.english: You can learn more at this page on the IRS website.
sentences.chinese: 大家可以在國家稅務局的網站上了解更多的信息。

sentences.english: I have received a mail from Fengxian Administration of Tax on the levying of education supplementary tax.
sentences.chinese: 我收到奉賢稅務局郵件，關於徵收教育費附加稅事務。

sentences.english: The Inland Revenue Department yesterday declared that all contributors to the appeal will be exempt from paying tax in Hong Kong on their donations.
sentences.chinese: 稅務局昨日宣佈所有捐款可在香港作扣稅用。

sentences.english: The taxman will levy surtax on the waxworks.
sentences.chinese: 稅務局將對蠟像館徵收附加稅。

sentences.english: I agree to have the TRCs maintained in scripless form in an account held with Commissioner of Inland Revenue (CIR).
sentences.chinese: 本同意儲稅券以無票據形式存放在稅務局局長的帳戶。

sentences.english: The tax agency has reported the case to the Dong Nai People's Committee.
sentences.chinese: 同奈稅務局已經將該案向同奈人民委員會報告。

sentences.english: The revenue authorities have come down on me for the payment of twenty pounds income tax.
sentences.chinese: 稅務局要我交付20英鎊的所得稅。

sentences.english: The tax authorities have been harrying her for repayment.
sentences.chinese: 稅務局一直在催她補交稅款。

sentences.english: Evidence of registration with HM Revenue &Customs to pay PAYE and National Insurance.
sentences.chinese: 註冊稅務局繳交PAYE及國民保險的證據。

sentences.english: When the users need to maintenance, please show warranty card and state revenue standard invoice.
sentences.chinese: 用戶在維修時請出示保修卡及國家稅務局標準發票。

definition: to report (to the authorities)/to declare (to customs)
to file an income tax return/to declare dutiable goods (at customs)
to present/to give/to hand over/to hand in/to lay before
